metadata.dc:author: Illana Esteban, Emilio
metadata.dc:description: This article continues with a series dealing with cutting and dissection instruments and focuses on the queen of cutting instruments, scissors. In this article, the author lists the functional traits scissors have and their nomenclature in function of their use, organs which they cut into, etc
metadata.dc:title: La tijera (II). Caracter√≠sticas.
[Scissors (II). Characteristics].
